entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing drizzle or drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to a few flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
